name: Mercury
description: Mercury is a financial technology company that partners with FDIC insured partner banks to protect your money. Mercury offers its users a “banking stack”, with the goal of empowering startups, as well as making banking easier for all businesses.

apiProducts.label: Account Information
apiProducts.description: Query account type, routing and account numbers, and balance

apiProducts.label: Transactions
apiProducts.description: Download and search your full transaction history

apiProducts.label: Recipients
apiProducts.description: Get a list of your Mercury recipients or filter transactions by their ID

apiProducts.label: ACH Payments
apiProducts.description: Make programmatic ACH payments (100 free per month)

apiProducts.label: Invoicing
apiProducts.description: Create, send, and track invoices programmatically via the Accounts Receivable API
